title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Science Learning Through Empathy-Based Design of Web Collaboration Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can prototype web collaboration tools reflecting peers' cognitive and emotional needs by applying empathic design principles.
Learners can effectively utilize web-based collaboration tools for scientific problem-solving in PBL environments.
Learners can objectively measure the collaborative efficiency of designed tools through formative assessments and propose improvements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
